segments.text: Hello . I want to reconfirm our flight to London .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , sir . Did you call the airline ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I did . But I couldn't communicate with them in English.They speak only Spanish.So I need your help .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly , sir . What is the flight number and when are you leaving ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We are taking IB 385 to London tomorrow at 1 p . m .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I see , sir . We have the airline office inside the hotel . They have an English-speaking staff . Just dial 35 , please .
segments.speaker: S2
